pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.1.6: _Saṁvāsa_ is further defined in _bhikkhu-pācittiya_ 69 at [Bu Pc 69:2.1.21](pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.21).
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.2.2: The commentary at Sp.2.693 defines _pakkhasaṅkantā_ as joining another religion: _Pakkhasaṅkantā vāti titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā_, “_Pakkhasaṅkantā vā_ means those who have joined the ascetics of another religion.” Yet the idea of _pakkha_, “a faction”, also refers to factions within the Sangha, for instance, when the Sangha is split into different communities (_nānāsaṁvāsa_) that no longer perform legal procedures together.
